other_tests.findings: CSF parameters normal (glucose 82 mg/dL, ADA 3 U/L, proteins 45 mg/dL, 2 cells/mm³)
CSF showed lymphocytic pleocytosis with increased proteins and ADA levels, and low glucose
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressive improvement of CSF values over time, with a last sample showing 9 cells/mm³ and normal protein and glucose contents, 4 months after initial symptoms.
Negative on sample obtained on day 18 after admission.

other_tests.findings: Acute obstructive hydrocephalus with ventricular synechiae
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeated MRI showed progressive improvement of hydrocephalus.
